mapper.select: select * from tbl_board b, tbl_user u where b.user_email = u.user_email order by b.board_notice desc, b.board_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(board_num, user_email, board_title, board_content, board_notice) values(seq_board_num.nextval, #{user_email}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_notice})
